hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah that:The Prophet (ﷺ) led them in praying Zuhr with five (rak'ahs). They said: 'You prayed five.' So he prostrated twice after he had said the taslim, while he was sitting

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَفْعَلُ مَنْ صَلَّى خَمْسًا
chapter.eng-name: What a person should do if he prays five (rak'ahs)
